version_description:
Attributes of some units adjusted
The number of challenges increased
Bugs fixed
Some scripts modified
Initial titles of Napoleon, Blucher, Duke of Wellington increased

1. Newly-added campaigns: British Empire, Liberation of South America, The Birth of the Empire, and Roman Unification
2. Newly-added conquests: 1812
3. Newly-added challenges: Spanish War and Hundred Days' War

1. Newly-added challenges : the Crimean War
2. Newly-added conquests: 1815
3. Prices of facilities lowered: palaces, wonders, fortifications, and technologies
4. Characters of some princesses adjusted
5. Princesses can be recruited as generals
6. Turkish added
7. Bugs fixed

Added support for latest iPhones and iPads
Bug fixes

Added support for latest iPhones and iPads
Bug fixes

1．Newly-added Items
Medical Supplies: Large amounts of first aid supplies that can restore 25% of unit HP.
Medical Corps: Call together a skilled medical team that can restore 50% of unit HP.
2．Sailing gift package is newly added. After purchase, you can gain 15 roses, 5 silver medals, 1 gold medal, 5 medical supplies, 15,000 gold coins and 200 medals.
3．Famous General Package is newly added. After purchase, you can gain general Louis Desaix as well as 25,000 gold coins. You can also get 100 medals per day from the date of purchase whenever you log on.

1．Newly-added Items
Medical Supplies: Large amounts of first aid supplies that can restore 25% of unit HP.
Medical Corps: Call together a skilled medical team that can restore 50% of unit HP.
2．Sailing gift package is newly added. After purchase, you can gain 15 roses, 5 silver medals, 1 gold medal, 5 medical supplies, 15,000 gold coins and 200 medals.
3．Famous General Package is newly added. After purchase, you can gain general Louis Desaix as well as 25,000 gold coins. You can also get 100 medals per day from the date of purchase whenever you log on.
Rewarded video is added. After clicking and watching the video, players can get 'Medical Supplies' or 'Medical Corps', either of which can help troops restore HP during the battle.
